extendedInfo.description: You need to buy the Pro version and have ROOT (as in you MUST have ROOT!!!), move to /system/app to use with apps and games which require Mock Location to be disabled. The free version does not support Root and requires Allow Mock Locations under Developer Settings. The PRO version also has favourites,history and fake location on phone reboot! Support us by buying the PRO version, thank you!Fake Gps location so you can post on Facebook â¢, Twitter â¢, Foursquare â¢,  Google Mapsâ¢, Navigation, Whatsapp â¢, Yelp â¢,  Navigon â¢, TomTom â¢ or ANY OTHER app that uses your phone's locations (gps or wifi). The app will overwrite your current location elegantly and the third party apps will think you are in Paris under the Eifel Tower or in New York on Times Square! Prank your friends on Whatsapp, Twitter â¢, Facebook â¢ and Foursquare â¢ into thinking you are travelling the world!Rooted? Get the Pro version and move the app to /system/app/ to use with apps which check if Allow Mock Locations is enabled!You just MUST share your location with your friends, but the phone is almost dead, can't locate you or the GPS accuracy is bad? No problem, use our app!You can use the app with any other GPS positioning app or with our Location reminder Spoty to be found in more apps by developer.How to use:- Choose your faked location and press play and the app will insert the Fake GPS location into your android phone. The app will insert the fake gps position on Facebook â¢, Foursquare â¢, Google Maps, Whatsapp, Navigation, Navigon â¢, Tomtom â¢ or any other appErrors:- We received some errors from "strange" unidentified tablets, force closing reports.  This is an issue with your tablet and the installed maps app. Unfortunately your tablets will not function with any 3rd party app, you can fix it by manually installing a newer maps.jar fileYou can read more about it here:https://productforums.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topic/maps/UHqix3TXDCAPermissions:- Internet - to display the map view- Access Coarse and Fine Location - to fake your current location- Write settings - to try and modify the mock location settings, works on some phones only.- Allow mock locations under Developer settings (Applications). Jelly Bean users need to enable Developer Settings by going to Settings- About and pressing 7 times on the Build before they can change the "Allow mock locations"Make sure to check our other apps:â Walk and Text (Texting while walking is dangerous - not any more!)â Call Guard (block calls and sms or mms)â Talking Caller ID, talking SMS IDâ Spoty (Location Reminder, Call Blocker, SMS Sender, Profile Changer)â Battery Percentage Alarm Icon (See the Percentage of the Battery, â Emergency (Panic Button, sending your location in a case of emergency)â Amazon Free App of the Day Notifier â Safe Drive (call blocker and sms blocker while driving)â Hide Caller IDâ Whip It App from The Big Bang Theory (TBBT)â Total control (Shake2Call)
